page.title: 11A Small Housing Estate
page.content: I live in St. Lawrence in an estate called Clos Des Ormes. Before it was built it was a field. It was built about thirteen to fourteen years ago. The estate has about forty houses. There are about five houses along the road which leads to the main road. It has a car park at the top and garages for nine houses, but most of the houses have their garages next to their house. It has ten houses in the middle. My house has three bedrooms, one bathroom upstairs. Downstairs we have a dining room and a kitchen which is all in one with a work top in between them and a lounge, boiler room with a little room with a basin and a toilet. We have a patio, a garden and a lawn with a flower bed around it.
